attributes.action: Grant Mr Harry Patch a posthumous Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a mark of respect to the lost generation, we the people of Great Britain demand our elected government recognise the sacrifice made by Millions of young men by honouring the very last man to pass, His name is Mr Harry Patch. If this is denied, it will show the pure disregard that this government holds for the ordinary people of this nation.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
